description:
Delta forces her way into the Leaf Village to take Kawaki back and appears before Boruto and the others.  Naruto confronts her to protect Boruto, Himawari and Kawaki. She attacks Naruto with Scientific Ninja Tools that have been implanted into her heavily modified body. In response, Naruto unleashes the power of the Nine Tails, and a fierce clash ensues!
Source: crunchyroll
